choices.A: A composite application decouples the interface from business logic.
choices.B: A composite application exposes a process as a web service.
choices.D: A mediator decouples the interface from business logic in a composite application.
choices.C: A mediator exposes a process as a web service.

discussion.content:
B. A composite application exposes a process as a web service.
D. A mediator decouples the interface from business logic in a composite application.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about composite applications and mediators?

discussion.content:
B. It is a technique used for querying data prior to it being stored within a database or without it ever being stored.
C. It is a highly efficient method of analyzing and processing streams of data.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about Complex Event Processing (CEP)?

choices.E: It executes extremely complex queries against a database using a new query language.
choices.B: It is a technique used for querying data prior to it being stored within a database or without it ever being stored.
choices.C: It is a highly efficient method of analyzing and processing streams of data.
choices.D: It is a technique for rapidly storing large amounts of unstructured data.
choices.A: It is a method to achieve the best outcome in a model where data is already stored in a relational database.

choices.B: It can be used to filter, aggregate, and correlate events in memory and can integrate with Coherence, NoSQL, and HDFS.
choices.A: It primarily executes SQL statements against the database.
choices.D: It can perform spatial queries as well as complex
choices.C: It invokes human workflows to deal with exception handing.

discussion.content:
A. It primarily executes SQL statements against the database.
C. It invokes human workflows to deal with exception handing.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about the role of a Continuous Query Language (CQL) processor in a Oracle Event Processing application?
Which statement is false about debugging SOA composites?

choices.C: Breakpoints are the intentional pausing locations in a SOA composite application that you set for debugging purposes.
choices.A: You can run the debugger in Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control.
choices.D: If the composite is not already deployed in the current JDeveloper session, then JDeveloper will redeploy it.
choices.B: You can debug on local as well as on remote servers.

discussion.content: A. You can run the debugger in Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control.

questions.question_text: Which statement accurately describes event-driven architecture?

choices.B: It is a programing paradigm that views processing as evaluation of functions without regard for application state.
choices.D: It is an approach focusing on the production, detection, and consumption of potentially significant state changes.
choices.A: It is a design approach that fosters creation of distinct pieces of software where each piece is a self-contained unit of functionality.
choices.C: it is a style of building software that specifies logic without describing its control flow.

discussion.content: D. It is an approach focusing on the production, detection, and consumption of potentially significant state changes.
